name: 4th International Conference on Gender Studies and Sexuality
content: The topics of gender equality and representation, socio-political and cultural understanding, legislative and social efforts to combat discriminatory practices, the rights of the LGBT community members â€“ there are dozens of subjects that are as important as they are pressing. ICGSS 2024 will dive into the topics that impact the social fabric of communities around the world. It will uncover trends, discuss urgent needs, and use the power of the network to brainstorm innovative ideas. The 4th International Conference on Gender Studies and Sexuality is an event that every academic in the discipline must consider attending. So mark your calendar for March 14-16 and make your way to the majestic city of Berlin, Germany. Attending the sexuality conference is not only about presenting, it is also about the community and the people who attend them to hear about the latest research and share their knowledge.
